DbD may have some of the least competent developers of most games I've seen, and the balancing can seem random, asinine, and at times spiteful.

That said, there's a reason that I still play it and why it survives while everyone else that tries to muscle into the asymmetrical horror game space fails. The core game loop is fun, killer powers are varied and most are a lot of fun, and there's a lot of recognizable horror icons. It's a great game, just don't expect the devs to not buff the strongest character in the game and nerf the worst for no reason every so often.

Warning: MID. I love waiting 10 minutes with a 4 stack of friends to play survior. The aesthetics are cool ASF (They're bussing) but it doesn't matter when the primary gameplay loop doesn't really take advantage of the horror. Sitting around doing QTE skill checks is boring, and it was only really suspenseful the first 4 times that I played the game. After that, I just sort of became numb to the sound of a scary guy approaching, and stopped really giving a freak about this game. The nurse is kinda bad tho.

real

This game is abysmal. Everyone uses the same perks, everyone is toxic, and MMR is the worst thing known to man because you have to sweat your balls off to "Rise in rank" even though it shouldn't matter. It's made everyone think that they have to abuse the game's mechanics in order to win, or to even have fun. There's no uniqueness between matches, it's always same perks, same killers, same add on's, same types of players.

If you enjoy playing the killer role, I highly suggest you pass this game up. Playing killer is a joke, and not even remotely fun. Doesn't help that most killers a lame versions of one's that already exist. Last killers are just trash who have no power over the survivor's whatsoever.

Antigamente era melhor,você se divertia de verdade mesmo,agora o jogo ta cheio de "Mulher com Barba" que pega boneco colorido,e xinga você 92488248 milhões de vezes atoa,só porque você jogou mal.A comunidade ficou uma merda desde que os LGTV4KFULLHD dominaram,eles podem te xingar a vontade,mas se tu falar alguma coisa,tu toma no CU,sinceramente,não recomendo ninguém comprar esse jogo,se tu real tiver com vontade,compra pra jogar com os amigos em call,porque é só isso que o jogo oferece,assassino mesmo tem que tryhardar e msm assim,ser xingado no final,pq a mulher de barba achou ruim

Once upon a time my brother, his girlfriend, and I played a really fun game called Dead by Daylight.... Then they made it GARBAGE. Unless the killer is brand new, expect to lose. Dont waste your money. You wont win. Maybe one day they will patch back to scary fun perfection, but until then get railed someplace else.

Quando vcs vão acabar com essa mecânica absurda de body block nos ganchos? É praticamente impossível enganchar alguém num grupo pré-formado de survivors! Seria um game muito legal se a empresa levasse mais a sério o competitivo entre players, os ranks não valem nada, são apenas enfeites. Mecânicas absurdas como a citada à cima existem aos montes, o game desconhece o sentido da palavra "balanceamento". Na maior parte das vezes jogar é uma experiência frustante ao invés de divertida. Digo isso com 600 horas de gameplay mista entre survivor e killer e vários iridescentes 1 alcançados.
Overall a great game good with friends and by your self!!!!!!!!!!!!!

I have over 1000 hours in the game, and love it usually, but damn does it get really fucking annoying sometimes. Just because of shitty solo queue teammates, or just hit boxes being absolute garbage. But generally, it is a fun game once you get the hang of it and I am really happy with the direction it is going in. Oh and forgot to mention, if you don't like being called ass, a POS, or be told to KYS after a match, don't ever play killer. Or survivor. Or this game.
